description: If you, or know of a Fire Fighter as a friend or family member, then you aught to know about "The Fire Fighter's Prayer".  This poem was written by Firefighter A.W. “Smokey” Linn. As a young firefighter in 1958 Linn and his crew responded to a fire in which three children were trapped behind security bars and died in the fire.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask the fire fighters prayer
Alexa, tell the fire fighters prayer to give me the fire fighters prayer
Alexa, ask the fire fighters prayer to tell me the fire fighters prayer
name: The Fire Fighter's Prayer
